boardgame.name: 12 Thieves
A Bagdadi Tolvaj
Bagdadi tolvaj Zloděj z Bagdádu
Der Dieb von Bagdad
De dief van Bagdad
The Thief of Baghdad
Zloděj z Bagdádu
Złodziej z Bagdadu
boardgame.description: In 12 Thieves, first published as The thief of Baghdad, each player leads a group of thieves and tries to gain the best booty for themselves, but the treasure is well-guarded in the palaces of Baghdad, so you must slip your thieves into the guard corps and attempt to bribe those you can't represent with one of your own._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The player who plays their cards best and reacts most cleverly to the different situations will succeed in getting their thieves and guards well distributed in Baghdad, and therefore be the first to collect four pieces of treasure._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Besprechung von Der Dieb von Bagdad

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: We only sell brand new, shrinkwrapped games. International shipping available. Edition: Rio Grande Games (2006) RIO 069

New/Sealed The Thief of Baghdad the Board Game! We will ship only w/in the 48 US states via UPS Ground for $8.50 or Priority Mail for $11.50. Totally new and sealed and unopened! Fast Shipping with full insurance and tracking # emailed back to you w/in 2 business days! We take Paypal to creditcards@sphiatt.com (include the title of the game you are ordering in the payment box)), or money orders. We have 35,000+ Feedback on ebay and over 10,000 transactions with paypal so buy with confidence!

Game has just been played once - everything in great condition. Shipping at actual cost dependend on destination, total weight and method of shipment chosen. Usually shipping a single (regular sized) boardgame (surface) costs 12.90€ worldwide and 8.60€ within Europe. Smaller games ship cheaper. Of course multiple games can be combined.

Brand new and factory sealed! Gamers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Inn is a real store in Mesa AZ, and will ship via DHL Ground or the USPS. Most games will ship for $7.50 unless it is particularly light or heavy, or if you request Priority or special handling. Insurance is available on all orders for about $2. All games can ship international, and we will quote costs upon request. Delivery confirmation goes with every order. We do our best to give an accurate description of condition, and will ship them safely and quickly, and we will gladly combine shipping costs. In store pickup _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; payment is available with no shipping or handling charges. Arizona residents must pay 7.5% sales tax. About us: We can be reached at: info@gamersinnaz.com The store is open 24/7/365 and can be phoned at: 480-507-0509 Street address: 1232 E Southern Ave, Mesa, AZ 85204 You can check out our history as a Power Seller on eBay at: http://myworld.ebay.com/gamers_inn or on Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/gp/shops/index.html/104-7806078-3093525?ie=UTF8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;sellerID=A2M6J42JR1XQD Our home page: http://www.gamersinnaz.com
German version, but bits are language neutral. Only played once.

Played a few times. Pieces are in good condition, some very slight wear on the cards (you handle them a lot in this game). The box has a faint knife mark going across the width of the cover; I barely noticed it when I bought it at the store - it was there before I got it. I prefer check but will also accept check or m.o. Thanks, Jeff

I bought this game new and played it a few times. The pieces are in great shape, light wear to cards from shuffling. The box has some very light shelfwear. I am very finicky when it comes to the condition of my games, I keep them nice!
